column1: Baby Barnaby's////There are so many great brunch places in Houston
column2: but this is probably my favorite.  It reminds me of Magnolia Cafe in Austin
column3: but better service and even better food.  Green eggs??  Yes!  It is so creamy and cheesey and delicious.  And it's green so I can convince myself it's healthy.  I stick with the veggie sausage which is probably just the standard frozen kind you can get at the grocery store
column4: but I love it.  The potatoes are cooked perfectly
column6: and just the right size.  I always leave feeling super stuffed because I don't want to waste any of my food on the plate.
